item.title: 10 March 2023: GPT factual knowledge editing and RL from human feedback
item.description: Friday, 10 March 2023, 15:00 ELTE Lágymányos Campus, Northern Building (Pázmány Péter sétány 1/A), room 7.88 Papers Meng, Kevin, David Bau, Alex Andonian, and Yonatan Belinkov. 2022. “Locating and Editing Factual Knowledge in GPT.” Arxiv Preprint Arxiv:2202.05262. https://arxiv.org/pdf/2202.05262.pdf. Ouyang, Long, Jeff Wu, Xu Jiang, Diogo Almeida, Carroll L Wainwright, Pamela Mishkin, Chong Zhang, et al. 2022. “Training Language Models to Follow Instructions with Human Feedback.” Arxiv Preprint Arxiv:2203.02155. https://arxiv.org/pdf/2203.02155.pdf.
